HomeWiki:
Project Description
Toast8 - A remote controller for media apps on Windows 8+.
Show notifications and control Spotify using global hotkeys
Copyright Peter Nylander 2014

Uses SpotifyWebHelper to control and get information from Spotify. This includes starting/stopping playback, changing songs, retrieving album art and reacting to current status of the player.

I am in no way affiliated with Spotify, this is just my own pet project.

Inspiration and idea for project from:
Toastify - https://toastify.codeplex.com/
http://cgbystrom.com/articles/deconstructing-spotifys-builtin-http-server/
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10123804/retrieve-cover-artwork-using-spotify-api
http://www.fjun.com/websvn/filedetails.php?repname=software&path=%2Ftrunk%2FPC%2FIR-ReceiverHID%2FIR-ReceiverHID%2FSpotifyRemote.cs&rev=2275&sc=1
